keyEvents.title: 73,466th Duel Between Giants
keyEvents.description: Dorry and Brogy meet in the center of Little Garden for their latest duel, which becomes corrupted by Mr. 3's interference.
keyEvents.significance: The sacred dueling ground becomes the site of the first truly decisive battle between the giants, though achieved through deception.

keyEvents.title: Brogy Defeats Dorry
keyEvents.description: The giants' duel concludes with Brogy's victory due to Dorry's injuries and Mr. 3's sabotage.
keyEvents.significance: Marks a tragic milestone in the century-long conflict on Little Garden.

keyEvents.title: Mr. 3 Traps Brogy
keyEvents.description: Mr. 3 reveals himself on Little Garden and uses his wax powers to immobilize the grieving Brogy.
keyEvents.significance: Baroque Works' plan reaches its critical phase on the island.

description: A prehistoric island in the Grand Line where dinosaurs roam and two giant warriors have been dueling for 100 years.
significance: Site of Dorry and Brogy's century-long duel and the Straw Hats' confrontation with Baroque Works Officer Agents.
